scripts.build:all: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "cd shared && bunx eslint ." "cd backend && bunx eslint ." "cd frontend && bunx eslint ."
scripts.fix:all: concurrently "cd shared && bunx eslint . --fix" "cd backend && bunx eslint . --fix" "cd frontend && bunx eslint . --fix"
scripts.upgrade:all: concurrently "cd shared && bunx ncu -u" "cd backend && bunx ncu -u" "cd frontend && bunx ncu -u" && bun install
